title.en: The Prayer that Swiftly Fulfils All Wishes (Sampa Nyur Drupma)

text.en: Emaho! In the heart of a blossoming lotus, upon the waters of the lake,
text.en-trans: emaho, tso ü gesar pemé dongpo la

text.en: You are the deity who is the spontaneous presence of the fivekāyasand wisdoms,
text.en-trans: ku nga yeshe lhün gyi drubpé lha

text.en: O great, naturally arisen Padma Yabyum
text.en-trans: rangjung chenpo pema yabyum ni

text.en: Surrounded by clouds of ḍākinīs—to you we pray:
text.en-trans: khandrö trinpung trik la solwa deb

text.en: Grant your blessing so that all our wishes be quickly fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa nyurdu drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: As a result of our negative karma, whenever we suffer
text.en-trans: lé ngen chepé nammin tü kyepé

text.en: From illness, malevolent spirits (döns) and obstacles, warfare and violence, famine and starvation,
text.en-trans: né dön barchö mak truk mugé sok

text.en: Then remember your promise that even simply to think of you will immediately dissolve all such suffering—
text.en-trans: khyö zhal drenpé möla zé jepé

text.en: O Lord of Orgyen, we implore you, from the depths of our hearts,
text.en-trans: zhalzhé nying né kul lo orgyen jé

text.en: Grant your blessing so that all our wishes be quickly fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa nyurdu drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: To practise devotion, discipline and generosity,
text.en-trans: dé dang tsultrim tong la gompa dang

text.en: To free the mind through hearing the Dharma, and to have dignity, self-control
text.en-trans: töpé gyü drol trelyö ngotsa shé

text.en: And discriminating awareness—make these seven noble human qualities
text.en-trans: sherab pünsum tsokpé nor dünpo

text.en: Fill the hearts and minds of all sentient beings
text.en-trans: semchen kün gyi gyü la rang zhuk né

text.en: And so bring peace and happiness to the world.
text.en-trans: jikten dekyi denpar ukjin dzö

text.en: Grant your blessing so that all our wishes be quickly fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa nyurdu drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: When oppressed by illness, suffering and unwanted circumstances,
text.en-trans: gangla né dang dukngal mindö kyen

text.en: Falling prey to harm from negative forces and punishment from kings and leaders,
text.en-trans: jungpö dön dang gyalpö chepa dang

text.en: Threatened by fire, water, vicious animals, and journeys of great danger,
text.en-trans: mé chu chenzen lamtrang jikpa ché

text.en: When this life is spent and death arrives—at these times
text.en-trans: tsé yi patar tukpé nekab kün

text.en: We have nowhere to turn to except to you!
text.en-trans: kyab dang resa zhendu machipé

text.en: Care for us with your great compassion, O great Orgyen Guru:
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik guru orgyen jé

text.en: Grant your blessing so that all our wishes be quickly fulfilled!
text.en-trans: sampa nyurdu drubpar jingyi lob
